text: El Hayat newspaper (in Arabic جريدة الحياة meaning The Life) is a daily newspaper independent in Algeria Algérie : Un canular à la Une d' "El Hayat"., France 24.أناب تكرم صحفية جريدةالحياة الجزائرية, Nawafedh. published Saturday to Thursday in the tabloid format. == History == This newspaper is considered by some sources to be the first independent daily newspaper in Algeriaجريدة الحياة الجزائرية تنقل التوصيات التي خرج بها المشاركون في الملتقى الدولي حول الصفقات العمومية في ظل المرسوم الرئاسي 15-247, Univ-msila. to be issued by journalists who have not worked in the government press before and are not affiliated with any political party. == See also == * List of newspapers in Algeria == References == Category:Newspapers published in Algeria Category:Publications established in 2013 Category:2013 establishments in Algeria Category:Arabic-language newspapers Category:Mass media in Algiers
title: El Hayat (newspaper)
